razer BS2k, voodoo3 3000 agp(shit), 384megs ram, sbLive!<br>// http://energy.n3.net/<br>// internal energy<br><br>// lets get started with the basics..<br>seta name &quot;^7e^2.^7grant^2*^7&quot;<br>seta cg_teamChatHeight &quot;6&quot;<br>seta cg_teamChatTime &quot;60000&quot;<br>seta r_picmip &quot;5&quot;   //yeah - all you nvidia shits can suck it. voodoo3's w/ picmip's higher than 5 tend to start paining random parts of the map all black. it's awesome<br>seta cg_fov &quot;120&quot;<br>seta com_maxfps &quot;125&quot;  // no, i rarely if ever reach that =(<br>seta model tankjr<br>seta cg_forcemodel &quot;1&quot;<br>seta com_hunkMegs &quot;192&quot;<br>seta cg_trueLightning &quot;1&quot;<br>seta cg_enableOSPHUD &quot;1&quot;<br>seta cg_ammoCheck &quot;1&quot;<br>seta cg_smoothClients &quot;1&quot;<br><br><br><br>// player stuff<br>seta cg_autoswitch &nbsp;                 &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_bobpitch &nbsp;                 &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_bobroll &nbsp;                 &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_bobup &nbsp;                       &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_runpitch &nbsp;                 &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_runroll &nbsp;                 &quot;0&quot;<br><br>//movement<br>bind e +forward<br>bind d +back<br>bind w +moveleft<br>bind r +moveright<br>bind mouse1 +attack<br>bind mouse2 +moveup<br>bind a +movedown<br>bind = &quot;toggle r_fastsky&quot;<br>bind space +zoom<br>bind ctrl +movedown<br><br>//weapon binds<br>bind c      &quot;vstr w1;&quot;<br>bind q      &quot;vstr w2&quot;<br>bind mouse3 &quot;vstr w3&quot;<br>bind x      &quot;vstr w4&quot;<br>bind p      &quot;vstr w5&quot;<br>bind s      &quot;vstr w6&quot;<br>bind o      &quot;vstr w7&quot;<br>bind f      &quot;vstr w8&quot;<br>bind z      &quot;vstr w9&quot;<br><br>//crosshair<br>cg_drawCrosshair &quot;5&quot; // *dot* :D<br>cg_crosshairSize &quot;50&quot;<br>seta cg_crosshairY &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_crosshairX &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_crosshairHealth &quot;1&quot;<br><br>//mouse settings for that razer bs2k<br>seta cl_mouseaccel 0<br>seta sensitivity 6.5 //the 0.5 actually makes a difference i guess. i just played and changed it until my snap turns did 180 degrees instead of 170 or 190<br>seta m_filter &quot;1&quot;<br>seta m_pitch &quot;0.022&quot;<br>seta m_yaw &quot;0.022&quot;<br>seta m_forward &quot;0.25&quot;<br>seta m_side &quot;0.25&quot;<br><br>//graphics - goin' easy on the v3<br>seta r_ext_gamma_control &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_ext_multitexture &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_ext_compiled_vertex_array &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_ext_texture_env_add &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_detailtextures &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_texturebits &quot;16&quot;<br>seta r_colorbits &quot;16&quot;<br>seta r_stencilbits &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_depthbits &quot;16&quot;<br>seta r_overBrightBits &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_ignorehwgamma &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_mode &quot;3&quot;<br>seta r_vertexLight &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_subdivisions &quot;100&quot;<br>seta r_lodbias &quot;5&quot;<br>seta r_dynamiclight &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_mapoverbrightbits &quot;4&quot;<br>seta r_fullbright &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_lightmap &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_swapInterval &quot;0&quot;<br>seta seta r_colorMipLevels &quot;0&quot;<br>seta r_simplemipmaps &quot;1&quot;<br>seta r_flares 0<br>seta r__gamma 1.1<br>seta cg_scorePlums 0<br>seta cg_shadows &quot;0&quot;<br><br>//sound settings<br>seta s_separation 0.2<br>seta s_musicvolume 0<br>seta s_mixahead 0.1<br>seta s_rolloff 0<br>seta s_khz 11<br><br>//misc settings<br>seta cg_drawTimer &quot;1&quot;<br>seta cg_zoomfov &quot;35&quot;<br>seta cg_lagometer &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_simpleItems &quot;1&quot;<br>seta cg_drawRewards
